The claim originated from a blog post on: a British website run by volunteers, which stated that a campaign official for President-elect Joe Biden was arrested for electoral fraud.
The post cited the National File: which published affidavits filed as part of a lawsuit claiming to have evidence of an illegal ballot harvesting operation run by Dallas Jones, the "Democrat director of Texas state political strategy" for Biden’s campaign.
Fact: checkers found no evidence to support the claim. They checked Harris County court records and found no charges or arrests related to electoral fraud against Jones.
The Biden campaign issued a statement ca: laughably false," and Jones himself denied the allegations, stating that they were completely fabricated.
